Class PhotoDAOPostgres

java.lang.Object
fr.polytech.picknpic.persist.postgres.PhotoDAOPostgres
All Implemented Interfaces:
PhotoDAO
public class PhotoDAOPostgres extends Object implements PhotoDAO
PostgreSQL implementation of the PhotoDAO interface. Handles database operations for the Photo entity.
